channel.title: Anyone know how to fix this? Problem with my pots
channel.description:
Ok, all my other pots work, except for my super str, i pot to 120 str, i attack a creature, it goes to 115 110 103 and then 100 in a matter of seconds... Anytime i touch something while super str potted, it goes back to its original str lvl in like 5 seconds..Anyone know the fix?
The timer for it is same as my other pots

item.title: Anyone know how to fix this? Problem with my pots
item.dc:creator: @Original Original
item.description:
@Original wrote:

Sigh…It dosent work…it still lowers very fast…=.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone know how to fix this? Problem with my pots
item.dc:creator: @VorargC VorargC
item.description:
@VorargC wrote:

case 161: // super str (1) strPot = true; strPotTimer = 90; abc = getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]); cba = abc / 10; abc2 = cba * 2; if (abc2 <= 1) { abc2 = 2; } playerLevel[2] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]); playerLevel[2] += abc2; sendFrame126("@red@"+playerLevel[2]+"", 4006); deleteItem(161, GetItemSlot(161), 1); addItem(229, 1); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; GoOn = false; break; case 159: strPot = true; strPotTimer = 90; abc = getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]); cba = abc / 10; abc2 = cba * 2; if (abc2 <= 1) { abc2 = 2; } playerLevel[2] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]); playerLevel[2] += abc2; sendFrame126("@red@"+playerLevel[2]+"", 4006); deleteItem(159, GetItemSlot(159), 1); addItem(161, 1); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; GoOn = false; break; case 157: strPot = true; strPotTimer = 90; abc = getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]); cba = abc / 10; abc2 = cba * 2; if (abc2 <= 1) { abc2 = 2; } playerLevel[2] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]); playerLevel[2] += abc2; sendFrame126("@red@"+playerLevel[2]+"", 4006); deleteItem(157, GetItemSlot(157), 1); addItem(159, 1); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; GoOn = false; break; case 2440: strPot = true; strPotTimer = 90; abc = getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]); cba = abc / 10; abc2 = cba * 2; if (abc2 <= 1) { abc2 = 2; } playerLevel[2] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]); playerLevel[2] += abc2; sendFrame126("@red@"+playerLevel[2]+"", 4006); deleteItem(2440, GetItemSlot(2440), 1); addItem(157, 1); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; GoOn = false; break; case 113: strPot = true; strPotTimer = 90; abc = getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]); cba = abc / 10; aaa = cba / 2; abc2 = aaa + cba; if (abc2 <= 1) { abc2 = 2; } playerLevel[2] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]); playerLevel[2] += abc2; sendFrame126("@red@"+playerLevel[2]+"", 4006); deleteItem(113, GetItemSlot(113), 1); addItem(115, 1); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; GoOn = false; break; case 115: strPot = true; strPotTimer = 90; abc = getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]); cba = abc / 10; aaa = cba / 2; abc2 = aaa + cba; if (abc2 <= 1) { abc2 = 2; } playerLevel[2] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]); playerLevel[2] += abc2; sendFrame126("@red@"+playerLevel[2]+"", 4006); deleteItem(115, GetItemSlot(115), 1); addItem(117, 1); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; GoOn = false; break; case 117: strPot = true; strPotTimer = 90; abc = getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]); cba = abc / 10; aaa = cba / 2; abc2 = aaa + cba; if (abc2 <= 1) { abc2 = 2; } playerLevel[2] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]); playerLevel[2] += abc2; sendFrame126("@red@"+playerLevel[2]+"", 4006); deleteItem(117, GetItemSlot(117), 1); addItem(119, 1); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; GoOn = false; break; case 119: strPot = true; strPotTimer = 90; abc = getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]); cba = abc / 10; aaa = cba / 2; abc2 = aaa + cba; if (abc2 <= 1) { abc2 = 2; } playerLevel[2] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]); playerLevel[2] += abc2; sendFrame126("@red@"+playerLevel[2]+"", 4006); deleteItem(119, GetItemSlot(119), 1); addItem(229, 1); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; GoOn = false; break;
